xml.data:
Home » 37P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 8 Pītittika » 8.7 Pañhāvāra » 8.7.1 Paccayānuloma » 8.7.1.2 Saṅkhyāvāra
Suddha
Pītittika
Pañhāvāra
Paccayānuloma
Saṅkhyāvāra
Suddha
45.
761Hetuyā dasa, ārammaṇe soḷasa, adhipatiyā soḷasa, anantare soḷasa, samanantare soḷasa, sahajāte dasa, aññamaññe dasa, nissaye dasa, upanissaye soḷasa, āsevane dasa, kamme soḷasa, vipāke dasa, āhāre indriye jhāne magge sampayutte atthiyā dasa, natthiyā soḷasa, vigate soḷasa, avigate dasa.
762(Kusalattikaṃ anulomaṃ anumajjantena gaṇetabbaṃ.)
763Anulomaṃ.
<< 8.7.1.2 Saṅkhyāvāraup Paccanīyuddhāra >>
